parameters.name: Measure 1
parameters.hint: The measure will form the horizontal axis of the scatter plot. It will also form part of the k-means cluster operation

parameters.name: Measure 2
parameters.hint: The first measure will form the vertical axis of the scatter plot. This measure and additional ones will be included in the k-means clustering operation.

templates.name: Cluster Number
templates.description: Returns a K-Means cluster number which is best used as a Color By Measure option
templates.rscript: clusterdata <- q;clusterdata[is.na(clusterdata)] <- 0;set.seed(20); cluster <- kmeans(clusterdata,$(Number of Clusters),nstart = 20);cluster$cluster;

viz.title: K-Means Cluster - Scatter Plot
viz.description: K-means cluster displayed as a scatter plot

variables.name: Number of Clusters
variables.description: The number of clusters, adjust to meet your needs. Should be a numeric greater than 1 and less than the number of data points
